verbose_text: These include the tailoring of dextrose load according to glucose intolerance, the supply of fat emulsions not containing large amounts of the omega-6 polyunsaturated linoleic acid to avoid excessive amplification of the inflammatory response, and a daily dose of 1.5-2.0 g/kg amino acids (35 to 50% BCAAs).
evidence: amounts of the omega-6 polyunsaturated linoleic acid
